issue.title: [C++][Plasma] plasma-serialization_tests fails in release builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4829](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4829). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
